website_summaries.verdict: A terrific hand cream that smells and feels great on the skin – a top choice by enthusiasts of the luxury brand and the one we recommend if you want the best.
pros: This exceptionally rich hand cream is capable of moisturizing the driest skin, thanks to the 20% shea butter formula
Also contains coconut oil, almond, and honey for added moisturizing
cons: Garners both complaints about the high price and praise for how well it works
The scent is a bit "perfumey" or "soap-like

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit product. The packaging is not the same color (i.e. The cap is black whereas the real product has a navy blue cap). The lotion does not smell anything like the real L'occitane, it smells very strongly like baby powder. The lotion is also much much greasier than the real L'occitane. Just purchase the lotion from L'occitane's actual website instead of using prime, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE LOTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is FAKE. Do not buy this lotion. It arrived loose in the box. When I opened it, the authentic tin seal - was NOT there. It has been emptied and filled with something that smells like baby powder. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I used to live close to a L'Occitane store but I moved and the closest store is in Canada. So I gave this one a try. The cream came opened (the seal was missing) without the box. The texture is not the same, it's more fluid than the one I had before. I have used the hand cream and other products and the quality and packaging are superb. I think this product might be fake. Next time, I'll buy directly from L'Occitane website.
customer_reviews.author: Kabuki

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE LOTION - NOT THE HANDLING
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this hand lotion is sublime, and I have been using this exact item for about 7 years. There is nothing else I would even bother purchasing in terms of silky hand lotion that absorbs, little to no odor, and works like a charm on hands abused by hot water, hot/cold climate changes in Texas, and general hand aging. The only reason I do not give this item 5 stars is because two out of the three tubes of hand lotion ordered were dinged up or "dented" as if they had been used. Since all three were gifts, I ended up only being able to give 1 of the tubes ordered since the others were too rough looking.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Elliott

customer_reviews.title: ... is not a cheat cream so I expected a better package. It is part of a present and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheat cream so I expected a better package. It is part of a present and was damaged. Not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: From the first day I applied it ( dabbing it on the end of my back scratcher and smearing it on my back) I could feel it actually cool my skin and after applying it daily it's the ...
customer_reviews.text: For years my back will itch at night and just drive me crazy. I always have scratches on it so I read about this lotion somewhere and decided to try it not really thinking it would make a difference. From the first day I applied it ( dabbing it on the end of my back scratcher and smearing it on my back) I could feel it actually cool my skin and after applying it daily it's the first time in years my back hasn't itched and no scabs from scratches. It's an amazing lotion.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse I wash my hands a lot during the shift and my hands get really really dry. I was looking for a pocket-size good quality cream that I could take to work. Took this with me to work for the first time and applied it at least 6 times over a 12 hr shift.. I got disappointed as my hands went back to being very dry after each hand wash.. washes off way too easily for a good expensive cream, makes me think it doesn’t really absorb and penetrate the skin..
customer_reviews.author: yuliya

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price....
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and save your money- You will get the same results (or lack of!) from any cheap drugstore brand. I really don't understand after using this why there are so many favorable reviews? Granted my hands are dry, but any softness given by this product is immediately washed down the drain after washing my hands. If I have to reapply every time I wash my hands to get any benefit, I can get that same benefit from any hand cream, and for much less money. I tried to give the product a few weeks to see a difference, but the only difference I see is a bigger hole in my pocket, LOL. Sending back today!
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Treat yo self!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand cream. I have tubes of it everywhere. One in my office desk, one in my purse, one in my bathroom at home, one in my car. It's the best hand cream for dry skin. It absorbs quickly and leaves very little greasy feel. It has a very light scent, which is great for those of us that are smell sensitive (or for others that may be near by). It's a little pricier than Eucerin or Aquafor, but it feels like a nice treat. I like to give it as gifts to my girl friends and co-workers.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Mama

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product - will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lotion! Very thick, slightly greasy - which absorbs quickly - and seems to have the power to remove (for awhile) incipient crepey wrinkles on my hands! Pretty miraculous. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Thomsen-Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Magic butter lotion without the greasy after feel!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mouisturizing lotion and no greasy after feel!! It’s like magic butter without the grease! Very mild smell almost like a faint baby powder smell. But as long as my hands are moisturized in the winter and not looking super dry and cracked I am super happy!! But be forewarned: this is a small/ travel sized lotion. I think it is worth every penny and it’s super helpful to be able to put it in my purse for when I need it. I’ll be buying the bigger one ASAP!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great texture, fragrance, greatly improves skin quality in those dry winter months.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, comforting scent. I just purchased a few different brands of fancy hand crème and while I prefer the floral fragrances, the texture and fragrance of this is really wonderful. I wash my hands constantly at work and this has really, REALLY helped. A little goes a long way and the size of the tube is pretty generous compared to the other fancy brands out there. Was a big fan of C&E for years, but honestly I feel the quality is superior to most others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Thick, Sweet Cream
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to spend a lot of money on beauty products, but this one is worth it. Someone gave my mom a tube and she liked it. I tried it over a few days and like it too. This thick, creamy lotion has a subtle fresh and flowery scent. I think it's lovely and my hands feel great. It is not waterproof and does wash off like most hand creams do if you forget you just used it. There are a lot of good hand creams out there for really great prices. If you want to feel you are pampering yourself just a little then this is a great start!
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: This is magic!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from eczema on my hands. I had tried every hand cream for it and nothing healed them until I purchased this hand cream. When I received the cream I was worried because it does have a strong perfumed scent and I have very sensitive skin. But it was natural and didnt bother my hands at all. In about 1 week of using this hand cream my hands condition have improved and they are almost 100% again!
customer_reviews.author: JHob

customer_reviews.title: Gives a good and fresh feel to the skin
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's just simply you get what you pay for. I bought this one along with a cheaper brand but received very high reviews, and this one do stand out a lot. If you want to know what the other one is you may look into my profile, purchased in the same day to compare them. This one do give a very fresh and moisturized feeling to the skin, and NOT TOO OILY, it's very easy to overdone this and you can tell the difference as soon as you put it on. The scent is very light and natural, not too stand out, which is great especially you are like me who loves to use essential oil at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not the original product I’m used to
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years. What I received is NOT as the original bought at the brand’s store. It’s not as hydrating, has a different texture and a different smell. Which makes me wonder if it’s a counterfeit product. Returning. Sad, as I like the convenience of ordering through Amazon and didn’t want to bother returning a product.
customer_reviews.author: gigi @ NY

customer_reviews.title: Love this hand cream!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this hand cream for 7 years! I first discovered the L'Occitane brand when I found their store in Covent Garden in London England while on a trip. I have tried and bought many of their products, but this hand cream is my favorite. I use it every night before bed and my hands are soft in the morning. My cat thinks it is real cream because he licks my hands when I wear it! The nice part about finding it on Amazon is that I don't have to shipping if I need just this item, with Prime of course.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Tsangaris

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Stole It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dry hands and as a treat to myself. It turns out my husband likes to use this after he washes his hands because he likes the smell, and his hands are so dry from washing them all day (he tries to blame COVID-19, but he just really likes fancy things). So maybe my husband should be the one writing this dang review!! I used this *twice* and it was heavenly. The smell is clean and not strong, but also not light. Maybe a 6 out of 10 smell strength. I’m sensitive to smells and this was just fine. Relaxing actually. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cortez

customer_reviews.title: BEST ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this brand! A bit pricey but soo worth it! This cream i bought for my dry hands constantly washing and sanitizing and it really helps my hands come back! Soft hands and the smell is very light no crazy smells to give headaches i am sensitive to perfumes smells. I recommend if you want a very moisturizing hand cream.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Family

customer_reviews.title: Great all-purpose hand lotion from trusted brand!
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this hand lotion, years ago, I joked that it was similar to diaper rash cream. Years later, and many lotions later, I have come back to this because it is wonderful for my very dry hands. It is also easy to transport, so I always have a tube on me. The shea butter is very moisturizing, without being greasy, and it has a mild, pleasant scent that doesn't detract from perfume/cologne. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Skidge76

customer_reviews.title: A Must For Winter
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a long time for a hand cream that would keep my fingers tips from developing painful cracks in the winter. One year my wife put a tube of this in my stocking at Christmas and I've been using it since then. It's great! I just keep a tube in my night stand and put on a healthy layer before bed and I don't get cracks. My hands stay nice and soft. The scent is light and clean, not flowery or heavily perfumed. It's a little expensive, but, any good hand cream that really works is.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Awful
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the absolute worst hand cream I have ever attempted to use. It is hard, doesn't spread well, which causes you to use too much in order to achieve coverage. The end product is a sticky mess with no absorption. The results, after a month are nill, nothing but frustration and mess. I cannot understand the favorable reviews or even how this product remains on the market. I've used far less expensive hand creams with far better results. This so called hand cream is worse than useless.
customer_reviews.author: Annsi

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a brick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for many years. Obviously, I like it. However, the most recent tube I received is hard as a brick. It takes a lot of force to get it out of the tube. The bit that comes out is so hard and dry it will roll off your hand if you are not careful. You must rub it vigorously to generate enough heat to get it to melt a bit before it goes in. The must be a very old tube or otherwise defective. For the price, I expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Victor D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: May Work Better For Some
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this...I have VERY dry skin on my hands (especially in the winter) and the hand cream came highly recommended. I wasn't crazy about the scent at all, and the cream seemed a bit greasier than I thought it would be without retaining moisture as much as I had hoped. Obviously, this is a personal review because others appear to be fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: ctsoxfan

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, smells awful.
customer_reviews.text: Do you like smelling like a freshly diapered baby? Do people 30 feet away from you enjoy that smell as well? If so, this is a product for you! Not me, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Minden

customer_reviews.title: Very effective hand cream.
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream may be more expensive than some other types or brands, but I believe it is well worth it. I purchased this cream for my wife as a gift, and she has said and I have observed it helping with her hands drying and cracking during these winter months. Other brands we had gotten would either not work well or for very long, or would require you to use so much to work that it would run out quickly. I'm not sure if it is the higher percentage of Shea Butter that makes this more effective but it really seems to work, and it doesn't take much so the tube should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Amazon mishandles items like these
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing but buying it from amazon is not. Look at the state of this product. Box is damaged and ripped and hand créeme is dented and squished.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best hand cream ever, as far as I'm concerned. I have a few others--at work, by the sink, etc. But really, nothing compares to this. The difference in my hands is immediate and lasting. They do not feel greasy, just soft and smooth. I will always have this around because I love it. Also, it lasts, a little goes a long way because it is so rich in Shea butter.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morehart

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry hands
customer_reviews.text: Very thick but glides on silky with no greasy residue. It absorbs well. A great cream for dry hands and has a soft baby powder-like scent with a tinge of citrus. I wasn't sure I liked the scent at first; it is unlike any other hand cream scent I've experienced. I find I like it very much now. I recommend it as a good therapeutic hand cream and feel it is worth the price. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: L. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, hate the lid.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to help with my fingers that crack in the winter. Sure it's more expensive than other options but this stuff really is silky smooth and it smells great. Best of all it helps with my cracked winter skin. What I don't care for is the lid. It's small and I have trouble handling the small lid when my hands have just been lathered with cream. I wish the lid was shaped differently of just bigger. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: solid

customer_reviews.title: Was NOT worth the price
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing special or extravagant about this product to warrant the price they are asking. It smells like baby lotion and it leaves a slightly oily/ shiny film on my hands after I use it. It's just fine. Nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Taiylor Wineland

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Cream
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this brand years ago and became obsessed. Then a wedding and a child came along which halted my ability to spend money on unnecessary purchases. So I went back to drug store hand cream. I was browsing Amazon Luxury Beauty items and came across this and decided that it was time to spend some money on ME again. Hand cream purchased and no regrets. I love this stuff. It's thick and does a great job moisturizing my skin. A little bit goes a really long way and this tube will last forever. Quality brand, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Candace M

customer_reviews.title: performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cream for my daughter who is a nurse and washes her hands frequently throughout the day. She also wears rubber gloves because she is working with covid 19 patients . she has t wear a gown, head covering and rubber gloves at all times because she works a lot of the time outside taking peoples temperatures. This time of the year is hot and she and the other nurses work8-9 hours every shift. The Shea butter hand cream works quite well and she is very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: sue celaschi

customer_reviews.title: The BEST.
customer_reviews.text: My sister spoiled me with this luscious hand cream. I use before bed, absorbs quickly, and my chapped hands feel moisturized and soft in the morning. I love the faint smell! Clean!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Moran

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail!
customer_reviews.text: I help run a cage-free doggie daycare, boarding, and grooming facility and I am constantly washing my hands and sanitizing them. My hand became so dry that my skin actually cracked and split open. I ordered this lotion and I'm not kidding you, by day 3 the skin on my hands were so much better. I have recommended this product to everyone that mentions dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a tube.
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse I wash my hands frequently and have been trying creams, lotions and emollients for years for the extreme dryness of the tops of my hands and fingers. This particular formulation from L’Occitane, in my opinion, is the best by far. It is expensive but it only takes a small amount with each use so the value to dollar ratio is impeccable!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Hinely

customer_reviews.title: My new holy grail!!! :D
customer_reviews.text: Was wondering what all the hype was all about with this-read reviews and even did my own research, everyone that knows me knows I can't live with out hand cream, especially in the winter time hands get so dry, cracked, and thirsty. Received in a couple days and was totally blown away, all natural ingredients and non greasy unlike most other lotions I've tried. Absorbs quickly into the skin, cream is very thick but rub it to activate the shea butter and its very effective. Would definitely buy again!! And may try other products from L'Occitane
customer_reviews.author: bronzestar

customer_reviews.title: amazing lotion
customer_reviews.text: my mom loves this, I bought it as a gift for her on a whim once and she loved it so much that I have bought several times for her. she is very selective about lotion being non-greasy, and working well.
customer_reviews.author: Millers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for the cap
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to, hands down favorite, most beloved hand lotion of all time for years. I wish L'occitane would redesign the cap to be connected to or stay attached to the container. I cannot tell you how many times I have dropped it or lost it completely. Also, the currently cap design does not easily screw on. Can we PLEASE have a pop-on and -off attached cap, PUH-LEEEEEZE?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Great cream.
customer_reviews.text: I tried before Neutrogena Norwegian formula, NakedBee and DollarShaveClub hand creams. Personally for me I found them greasy, smell too strong and smell too strong respectively. This one smells good, fast absorbing and feels nice on your skin. Some people mentioned how small the tube is, but let's be honest, you know what you are buying. If you don't like it then don't buy it in the first place. I bought it for myself to try it out and see if I want to invest in the bigger tube. Great cream.
customer_reviews.author: Sergii

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is pretty overrated. There's a lot of hype around the ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty overrated. There's a lot of hype around the product: 1 tube sold every 4 seconds, the touting of their client satisfaction surveys on the box, etc. Long and the short of it is that I put it on, my hands feel soft and dewy for about 20-30 minutes afterwards, and then my hands feel like I never put on anything at all. I asked my fiance what she thought and she said the exact same thing. Definitely not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a restroom
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer works well. But it smells like a combination of all the cleaners they use in a public restroom. It is a strong, unmistakable scent. It’s really bizarre. I had a few coworkers smell it (because there’s no better way to make friends at a new job than to say “what do my hands smell like to you”) and they all said the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this from the L'Occitant store at the mall but it is much more convenient to get it from Amazon. This is one of the few serious hand creams on the market that really work.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Your delivery people are irresponsible.
customer_reviews.text: Dont know if my daughter likes the product. I gave instructions to deliver to office, this is a locked bldg. This is NOT THE FIRST TIME this has happened. It is unthinkable to me that your delivery people do not follow instructions. If she gets home from work and this item is missing... I expect you to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: selective

customer_reviews.title: Best Lotion Ever! :)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this very rich lotion that absorbs right away leaving your skin so soft and with a gentle soft smell. Works very well for hands & feet to keep them amazingly soft. Have bought the small 1oz lotion many times, but it was very nice to have a large one in our home for us all to use. The small ones are great for your bag, but the big one is great as it last much longer. Great gift, nice treat to yourself, very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie-NY

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t think I was going to like it but I do.
customer_reviews.text: I spent the money because this was a good brand. Although I thought the packaging would be problematic it’s working for me. The handcream is very lovely. Very light non-greasy but extremely moisturizing. It’s thick but not too thick. Anyone would love this in the winter. it’s thick but not too thick. Anyone would love this in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Ward

customer_reviews.title: Stinky :(
customer_reviews.text: The lotion feels good, as expected since this brand is well respected and shea butter is known to be amazing. However, it smells like a baby diaper (not a dirty diaper, but like plastic and baby powder) and literally is nauseating to me. I’m sad. Since it wasn’t inexpensive I’ll try to use it. I’m thinking if I put it on my feet maybe the scent will be far enough away that it won’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: The best hand cream in the world
customer_reviews.text: We've tried many hand lotions and hand creams over the years, and L'Occitane Shea Butter can't be beat. It's absolutely the best and worth every penny. It's very concentrated so a tube lasts a very long time. Honestly, it's so good that I've even gifted this one single tube of cream - it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: PHLFCO

customer_reviews.title: The one the only L’Occitane hand cream!! 🧡🧡
customer_reviews.text: I know the price is high but I promise you, this is the best hand cream you can buy and it will LAST and last!! Just a lil dab’ll do ya. It’s so creamy and sinks right in and leaves just a hint of fragrance. I’ve been using it forever and continue to reorder. L’Occitane’s products are high quality. Perfect for those cold winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow94

customer_reviews.title: works from the first use!
customer_reviews.text: i love this lotion. i bought it based on the reviews and i am also familiar with the brand name from social media influcers. it is fast absorbing. doesnt feel heavy on the hands. u steel feel the softness of it but not the greasyness of it. it smells very nice and works from the first use!!
customer_reviews.author: Merve

customer_reviews.title: The best hand cream I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I use this all year round, not just in the winter. Since the pandemic started, when we're washing our hands all the time, it's been even more valuable. It goes on smoothly, isn't greasy, doesn't have a strong scent, and leaves hands feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: This product works better than ANYTHING I've used before for my dry hands!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion makes your hands soooo soft! The first time you use it you'll notice an immediate difference. After a week it's like ho-ly sh!t. I have really really dry, hard hands...my bf pretends not to notice but we both know. He picked up on how soft my hands have become after using this. And I say with no shame that I use it on my little feet too.
customer_reviews.author: Karabella

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hand cream, but am very disappointed in the packaging. The silver tube it came in had a pasted-on label that eventually came off and left the tube very sticky where the label had been. Such a nice and fairly expensive product should have been packaged in a much better manner! Will buy more if the packaging changes.
customer_reviews.author: BGNorth

customer_reviews.title: Works better than any prescribed
customer_reviews.text: One of my hand’s skin in recent years occasionally will become very dry and sometimes crack and bleed. Many creams and lotions and even prescriptions did nothing much. This creme worked for me like no other. My hand is in the best shape it has been in a decade.
customer_reviews.author: Eric E

customer_reviews.title: Good dry hand cream.
customer_reviews.text: With all the hand washing done now, you hands dry up quick. Since C & E went out of business, I tried this cream. Remember lotions sit on top of your skin, creams penetrate your skin. The product came early, and I like it. Not greasy like others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Soft Hands
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after seeing a recommendation for it on my iphone. I live in Colorado and all body parts are usually dry; especially hands. This product really works for my 70+ skin and I've really seen an improvement. Hands stopped hurting in our dry winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: LPLoveland

customer_reviews.title: Essential for undereye lines!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll tell you ladies and the men if they will listen... Best cream to dab (fabulous really) for undereye. Lightly ‘dab’ under your eye before applying your coverup highlighter. It softens out my old lady wrinkles (softens=removes). I know it’s a hand cream. But really they don’t know the tricks this does for undereye crappieness. The manufacturer does even know this. I’m 68. Believe me it Works...
customer_reviews.author: Cherie D

customer_reviews.title: If you have only one moisturizer - this should be it.
customer_reviews.text: Shea butter is the best for moisturizing your hands and this product rocks that moisture. I bought this on a recommendation from a fellow worker for the wife and while we compared other products this is the golden one!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kerr

customer_reviews.title: No long lasting effect
customer_reviews.text: When I use a hand cream I expect it not only work when it’s on my hands, but also repair the skin so when I wash it off the skin is not as dry and damaged. This cream feels nice when you put it on, however when you wash hands the skin goes right back to the dried and damaged state it was before the cream application. If you want to constantly apply cream - this one is for you. I need a cream that repairs damage and any mass market cream does it better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Fradkina

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product - gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: After suffering from eczema for about four years, this product drastically improved the texture of the top of my hands within five days. I am still using it, and it's not all gone yet, but I see improvements constantly. Nothing has worked better.
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love love this hand cream and wish it came in ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love this hand cream and wish it came in a perfume because I would buy it in a heart beat. It has such a fresh clean smell and I have been using it for years now. So glad Amazon sells it because it saves me a trip to the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rishmawy

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as in the store
customer_reviews.text: I have been addicted to L'Occitane hand cream for many, many years, but had only purchased it in L'Occitane brick and mortar stores before. I was swamped and ordered it for the first time on Amazon. It is not runny, but much less dense. Exactly the same product, so I'm not sure what caused this, but will not be ordering on Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Strange

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is a bit on the expensive side, but it is amazing! With all the additional hand washing going on these days it has been a life saver! Not sure I'll be able to afford my next tube when I run out. :(
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Girl

customer_reviews.title: Soft hands
customer_reviews.text: Originally I used it sporadically and it was just so - so. Now I use it liberally on my hands just before bed and find that it keeps my hands soft all day. Really great. Bye the way this review (and actually all of the) are from his wife!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth gibbs

customer_reviews.title: great hands
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is Pricey but it is the best hand cream
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It soaks in and feels nice, but it just doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok, definitely not worth the price. It soaks in and feels nice, but it just doesn't last. I have tried tons of hand creams for my dry hands and cuticles abused as a working RN and mother of 2 toddlers. I love the H2O hand and nail cream, which I continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Billiejane79

customer_reviews.title: Make the packaging better!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. But I was not happy after using it a couple of times both of the sides ended up getting a hole in it. The NEED to change The packaging should be a little bit better every time I squeeze the lotion the sides of the lotion comes out making a mess everywhere. I had to end up wrapping it up with tape so it doesn’t leak out!!!! I feel that Amazon or the company should’ve been able to send me another one or give me a coupon even though I took a picture and sent it in nothing came out of it!!! And show them proof of purchase !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Khan

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't even get the lotion out of the bottle it was defective. Got a refund
customer_reviews.author: Heidi likes to shop

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is original?
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a bad condition with the box all beaten up as well as the lotion (see picture). Not sure if this was supposed to have a security seal but mines didnt. The product isn’t thick and consistency doesn’t seem the same for mine as with other purchasers. The lotion is thin and watery-like. Very overrated for the price
customer_reviews.author: IloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My sister left a partially used tube when she was visiting one time and I have been hooked ever since. The scent is just heavenly, but I really like that it absorbs into your hands right away and doesn’t leave a greasy coating.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My sister left a partially used tube when she was visiting one time and I have been hooked ever since. The scent is just heavenly, but I really like that it absorbs into your hands right away and doesn’t leave a greasy coating.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Soft hands coming your way!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my fav hand cream for at least 20 years. Love the fragrance but more than that, love how it leaves my hands feeling soft & moisturized. A little bit does the job. With its price point, it is my nighttime moisturizer and only occasionally daytime use.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: wifes favorite new hand and foot cream. she loves it
customer_reviews.author: zack morris

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic product. It feels and smells great on hands ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic product. It feels and smells great on hands and the tube should last a long long time. Worth spending extra on.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry, cracked hands!!
customer_reviews.text: This is easily some of my favorite hand cream as I suffer from chronically dry hands from being an obsessive hand washer. Sleeping with gloves on after application helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, yummy, yummy
customer_reviews.text: Yummy, yummy, yummy. And so nice that my daughter even uses it on her face in the winter-time (she has to walk to class at college).
customer_reviews.author: mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best hand creams I've ever used. This non-greasy cream is quickly absorbed making dry winter skin is a thing of the past.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Soft hands!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product,it needs about 3 days before you really notice results (2×/day) I was starting to think it wasn't going to work,but sure enough my hands look young & the skin is so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Hakala

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lotion
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion! It works wonders, unfortunately my husband hates the smell. Which is no smell really, I think he doesn’t like the smell of shea butter but I don’t know. Once on he’s fine with it, just can’t apply it within his snelling distance lol
customer_reviews.author: Penny Mills

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Christmas. The smell is absolutely amazing and leaves our hands extremely soft. Doesn’t leave your hand slippery. It’s no longer my husband’s it’s now our family hand cream!!
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best hand cream ever! I have very dry skin especially my hands from washing away germs. My skin rashes and creams burn. Not L'Occitane Shea butter hand cream! Its soothing; softening; and non burning. It's quite pricey compaired to other creams like Neutrogena; or Aveeno; but both these work okay only the softening doesn't last as long as L'Occitane. The tube is twice the size and smells like baby makes your hands feel soft as a baby's bottom. I love this cream was given as a present; best present I got. The tube goes along way almost the whole year through. Don't buy the scented ones;there greasy and smell strong and sting.
customer_reviews.author: 30donnam

customer_reviews.title: Best hand lotion ever
customer_reviews.text: Smells really really good!! My hand was really sensitive to warm water since I keep washing bottles and dishes without gloves. I only used couple times and all of those gone. Expensive but worth money.
customer_reviews.author: Luan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this moisturizer!! It's the absolute best. The texture is thick and luxurious - it absorbs well and leaves you skin so soft - not greasy. I MUST have it by my side in the winter months. The fragrance is heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: Elizakat

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love all Loccitane Shea butter products. I love the smell and the way the cream absorbs (never greasy). I even use it as my fragrance as I do not like perfumes much at all. It just has a clean smell somewhat nutty, but not overpowering, The tube is giant size and packed solid. My skin feels very soft when I use it. I shake hands a lot at work and it is nice to get compliments on my skin, (I am 62 by the way, so I will take all compliments!) The one thing I wish they would consider is changing the little cap. It is a bit tricky at times simply because it is so small.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The best hand cream , hands down! I was reluctant due to price but it is the ONLY hand cream I will buy. Smells amazing and you do not need a lot. I absolutely will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria C

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT what my sister bought that I tried and fell in love with. It leaves a greasy feeling and smells like baby powder. I do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Turner-Allen

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the biggest waste of money. The smell is just awful, like mothballs and soap. It literally makes me nauseous. It absorbs ok but there are way better options out there. I just bought a fantastic one from trader joes that is at least triple the size, smells great and costs $4.99. Save your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: No any help for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any difference in my hands using this cream they are still rough and dry. I applied at night before going to bed. No difference. Will have to continue the search to find the right cream.
customer_reviews.author: Dev Khosla

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Cream Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite! I needed a hand cream that would work for my work situation. In a medical office I use sanitizer every 5 minutes at least. My hands were cracked and dry. After buying this hand cream, I saw a difference in minutes. I've been buying L'Occitane in my local retail store ever since! You have to try this! It smells great and a little goes a long way. I love the face that this is fast absorbing and goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tekgeekgirl

customer_reviews.title: Best ever hand, foot and body cream!!
customer_reviews.text: Best hand, foot and body cream I’ve ever used!! Even lasts after light washing!!! Softens, smoothed and is quickly absorbed! Not like lotions that sit on the top of your skin and make you sweat! Best ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Tassie

customer_reviews.title: Every winter a must have
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every year. Best hand cream I’ve ever used. The scent is not overpowering and nice. Very think formula and not oily. I hate creams on my hands, but this is the only one that helps and doesn’t feel gross on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Cream
customer_reviews.text: There is no better hand cream that I have found and have tried everything from drug store brands to high end brands in cosmetic depts, which is where I buy mostly. L'Occitane is fantastic...I like the original formula and carry purse size with me at all times. Try it, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Granville

customer_reviews.title: Hand cream works very well!
customer_reviews.text: These shea butter small hand creams by L'Occitane work really well. My hands get dry in winter and these soothe them. This size is perfect in my purse or pocket and make good stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creamy Heaven
customer_reviews.text: The best hand cream ever because it is so thick and smooth. The 20% shea butter really helps protect and soothe my dry hands.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Missing seal.
customer_reviews.text: Well. The tube is tiny. It’s missing the seal. They sent a replacement. Same thing. It’s nice stuff but I can get Crabtree and Evelyn for half the price and 4 times the size. Too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Too spendy for the results
customer_reviews.text: The smell is softly divine. The results weren’t impressive. The price is stupid. The Vaseline cream in a tube or Weleda Skin Food heal and maintain far better and are more reasonably priced. Not sorry to try this, but definitely not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: a consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry, chapped hands
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream is one of the best for dry, cracked hands. It can feel a little greasy at first but absorbs well after a minute or two. The shea scent is light and pleasant, not overwhelming. My only qualm is that it's so dang expensive for one little tube! However they will continue to string me along because this is my fav.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have always had very dry skin on my hands in the winter. It is sore and itchy; it cracks and bleeds. I've probably tried every drugstore brand that there is and never really found anything that helped without being unbearably greasy. This hand cream is very thick, so a little goes a long way. It is a little greasy at first, but is then absorbed by the skin. I try not to wash my hands too frequently in the winter, but I have found the moisture lasts through at least a couple of washes. The fragrance is light and pleasant. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Songer

customer_reviews.title: Both Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to give as gifts because I love this moisturizer. The moisturizer is great for hands, but I wouldn't purchase as gifts. Both of them arrived damaged. The boxes looked like a squirrel had been after them and the tubes were dented and scratched. They didn't exactly say, "Happy Birthday!"
customer_reviews.author: ESH

customer_reviews.title: I just love this
customer_reviews.text: I actually used them on my feet, as it is the only cream/lotion that really hydrates them. It absorbs really quickly, leaving an amazing scent and the hydration is just incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Santagata

product_meta.title: L'Occitane Shea Butter Hand Cream, 5.2 oz
product_meta.description:
This creamy balm with 20% Shea Butter, honey, almond extracts and coconut oil are blended to create this extremely effective formula. The rich texture leaves hands soft and smooth, can be applied as often as needed.Tips & Tricks - Hands speak your age--but not indelibly. Shea Butter is used traditionally by African woman to soothe and smooth skin exposed to Earth's fiercest ultraviolet conditions, and now can help relieve and restore yours. Massage this silky treatment into hands to counter dryness as often as needed

FEATURED INGREDIENTS
Organic Shea Butter

Rich in fatty acids and unsaponifiable, Shea Butter is an ideal beauty ingredient that has been used for centuries by women in Sub-saharan Africa to nourish and protect their skin and hair. The international success of L’Occitane’s shea butter products can be shared with several thousand Burkinabé women, who are committed to developing a sustainable, fair trade shea butter supply chain. Organic Spring Honey Known for its soothing and nourishing properties, it helps soften the skin. Sweet Almond Oil Rich in omega 6 and 9, it nourishes and softens the skin. This almond oil is mostly used for its soothing and softening action on sensitive and dry skin. AQUA/WATER - BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER - GLYCERIN - DIMETHICONE - CETEARYL ALCOHOL - GLYCERYL STEARATE - LINUM USITATISSIMUM (LINSEED) SEED EXTRACT - MEL EXTRACT/HONEY EXTRACT - PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS (SWEET ALMOND) FRUIT EXTRACT - ALTHAEA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT - COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL - BRASSICA CAMPESTRIS (RAPESEED) STEROLS - HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL - POLYACRYLAMIDE - CETEARETH-33 - UREA - XANTHAN GUM - PEG-100 STEARATE - BUTYLENE GLYCOL - C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN - LAURETH-7 - ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN - SODIUM HYDROXIDE - BENZOIC ACID - DEHYDROACETIC ACID - PHENOXYETHANOL - CHLORPHENESIN - ALCOHOL - TOCOPHEROL - PARFUM/FRAGRANCE - LINALOOL - COUMARIN - CITRONELLOL - ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE - LIMONENE - GERANIOL

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
